heading: Gentle as a summer breeze.
subheading: Never again will you get a chill from the air conditioning. Experience the perfect comfort of diffused cooling. Enjoy pleasant air without drafts, cleaned of allergens and impurities, cooled evenly for maximum comfort.
why_info_item_1_description: The draft-free, diffused cooling of the Sensitive air conditioner ensures even and gentle distribution of cooled air throughout the room without unpleasant drafts. This system increases comfort without the risk of catching a chill.
why_info_item_2_description: Only 18 decibels, noise similar to the distant hum of wind. In the quietest mode, Sensitive is inaudible, making it ideal for bedrooms, offices, and any space where peace and comfort are important.
why_info_item_3_description: The UVC lamp eliminates bacteria and viruses, contributing to a healthier and safer environment in your home.
why_info_item_4_description: Control the air conditioner via Wi-Fi allows easy adjustment of temperature, modes, and other features through your smartphone or tablet from anywhere, anytime.
why_info_item_5_description: The high energy efficiency of R32 refrigerant ensures more efficient cooling and heating with the air conditioner, significantly reducing the impact on the environment. It is an ideal choice for a more sustainable future.
all_you_need_item_1_description: Naitec Sensitive automatically cleans, sterilizes, and then disinfects its internal evaporator with UV light to keep your air always fresh, free from bacteria and viruses.
all_you_need_item_1_long_description: When the “sterilization” function is activated, the evaporator in the internal unit first freezes and then heats to 57°C, which, combined with the UVC lamp, ensures the purification of the internal unit and the elimination of pathogenic bacteria. This technology provides a pleasant feeling of freshness in your home and creates a healthy atmosphere without unnecessary negative effects.
all_you_need_item_2_title: Heating with air conditioning down to -35°C
all_you_need_item_2_description: The ability to efficiently heat down to -35°C ensures a comfortable and pleasant environment even on colder winter days.
all_you_need_item_3_description: We take pride in quality, which is why Naitec Sensitive comes with a 5-year warranty, ensuring long-term reliability.
all_you_need_item_3_long_description: The extended warranty is only valid when regular servicing is performed at least once a year by the supplier from whom you purchased the air conditioner.
all_you_need_item_4_description: Optional voice controller Lisa for easy and convenient air conditioner control via voice.
all_you_need_item_5_description: In the app, you can set the performance limit for the air conditioner, allowing you to save up to 70% of energy.
